info.title: EU Digital COVID Certificate Business Rule Service
info.description: The API defines how to exchange business rule information for the EU digital COVID certificates.

get.summary: Gets the a list of all value set ids and value set hash values.
get.description: This method returns a list containing the ids and hash values of all value sets. The hash value can be used to check, if a value set has changed and needs to be updated. The hash value can also be used to download a specific value set afterwards.

parameters.name: X-VERSION
parameters.description: Version of the API. In preparation of changes in the future. Set it to "1.0"

200.description: Returns a list of all value set ids and there hash values.

get.summary: Gets a specific value set by its hash value.
get.description: This method can be used to download a specific value set. Therefore the hash value of the value set must be provided as path parameter.

parameters.name: hash
parameters.description: Hash of the value set to download

parameters.name: X-VERSION
parameters.description: Version of the API. In preparation of changes in the future.

404.description: Value set could not be found for the given hash value.

get.summary: Gets the a list of all business rule ids country codes and hash values.
get.description: This method returns a list containing the ids, country codes and hash values of all business rules. The hash value can be used to check, if a business rule has changed and needs to be updated. The hash value and country code can also be used to download a specific business rule afterwards.

parameters.name: X-VERSION
parameters.description: Version of the API. In preparation of changes in the future. Set it to "1.0"

200.description: Returns a list of all business rule ids country codes and hash values.

get.summary: Gets the a list of all business rule ids country codes and hash values for a country.
get.description: This method returns a list containing the ids, country codes and hash values of all business rules for a country. The hash value can be used to check, if a business rule has changed and needs to be updated. The hash value and country code can also be used to download a specific business rule afterwards.

parameters.name: X-VERSION
parameters.description: Version of the API. In preparation of changes in the future. Set it to "1.0"

200.description: Returns a list of all business rule ids country codes and hash values for a country.

400.description: The Country Code has a wrong format.

get.summary: Gets a specific business rule by its country code and hash value.
get.description: This method can be used to download a specific business rule. Therefore the hash value and the country code of the rule must be provided as path parameter.

parameters.name: country
parameters.description: Country code of the business rule to download.

parameters.name: hash
parameters.description: Hash of the business rule to download.

parameters.name: X-VERSION
parameters.description: Version of the API. In preparation of changes in the future.

application/json.example: {"Identifier":"VR-DE-1","Version":"1.0.0","SchemaVersion":"1.0.0","Engine":"CERTLOGIC","EngineVersion":"1.0.0","Type":"Acceptance","Country":"DE","CertificateType":"Vaccination","Description":[{"lang":"en","desc":"Vaccination must be from June and doses must be 2"}],"ValidFrom":"2021-06-27T07:46:40Z","ValidTo":"2021-08-01T07:46:40Z","AffectedFields":["dt","dn"],"Logic":{"and":[{">=":[{"var":"dt"},"2021-06-01T00:00:00Z"]},{">=":[{"var":"dn"},2]}]}}

400.description: The Country Code has a wrong format.

404.description: Business rule could not be found for the given hash and country code value.
